titles.title: Honoring the victims of the mass shooting at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas on December 6, 2023.
Honoring the victims of the mass shooting at the University of Nevada, Las Vegas on December 6, 2023.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the gun violence on December 6, 2023, that claimed the lives of three University of Nevada, Las Vegas professors and injured another faculty member. It also honors the memory and legacy of the victims and offers condolences and support to their families.
